00043 class SIM_API cGate : public cObject
00044 {
00045     friend class cModule;
00046   protected:
00047     mutable char *fullname; // buffer to store full name of object
00048     int  serno;         // index if gate vector, 0 otherwise
00049     int  vectsize;      // gate vector size (-1 if not vector, 0 if zero-sized gate vector)
00050     char typ;           // type of gate: 'I' or 'O'
00051 
00052     cChannel *channelp; // channel object (if exists)
00053 
00054     cModule *omodp;     // owner module
00055     int gateid;         // gate number within the module
00056 
00057     cGate *fromgatep;   // previous and next gate
00058     cGate *togatep;     //   in the route
00059 
00060     cDisplayString *dispstr; // the display string (created on demand)
00061 
00062   public:
00063     // internal: used from Tkenv: find out if cGate has a display string.
00064     // displayString() would create the object immediately which we want to avoid.
00065     bool hasDisplayString() {return dispstr!=NULL;}
00066     // internal
00067     void _setTo(cGate *g) {togatep = g;}
00068     // internal
00069     void _setFrom(cGate *g) {fromgatep = g;}
00070     
00071   public:
00074 
00078     cGate(const cGate& gate);
00079 
00083     explicit cGate(const char *name, char tp);
00084

00089
